CONTROLLINO MINI pure

The MINI is the smallest child in our CONTROLLINO family. But no worries – it’s still a big boy when it comes to the number of inputs and outputs (8 each). The incredible size to I/O ratio makes the MINI one of the most compact and versatile PLCs on the market.

On stock

€119.00 excl VAT

SKU 100.000.10 Category: MINI Tag: CONTROLLINO MINI pure SPS PLC

952 in stock

  • Description
  • I/Os
  • Additional information
  • Downloads

Description

The MINI is the smallest child in our CONTROLLINO family. But no worries – it’s still a big boy when it comes to the number of inputs and outputs (8 each). The incredible size to I/O ratio makes the MINI one of the most compact and versatile PLCs on the market.

 MINI Pure
5V Pin Header no
Analog/Digital Inputs 6 (2x only Analog)
Only Digital Inputs 2
Analog 0-10V Inputs No
Interrupt Inputs 2
Digital 2A Outputs 8 (3 PWM)
Analog 0-10V Outputs No
Relay Outputs 6 (parallel to Digital Outputs)
Serial TTL Interface No
I²C Interface No
SPI Interface No
RS485 Interface No
RTC 1
Ethernet Interface No
Stepper Driver Output No

Additional information

Weight 0.2 kg

Downloads

  • Instruction Manual
  • Pinout Table
  • Datasheet
